body:
I'm puzzled by this as well.  The use of the new "-n" option for
rtrace shouldn't affect whether it can find .cal files or not.  I
suspect that something else changed between tests, such as the setting
of the RAYPATH environment variable.

-Greg
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Re: Upgrading to R4: "There were some errors."
subject: [Radiance-general] Re: Upgrading to R4: "There were some errors."
